application.select_item: Please select an item to delete.
application.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this item?
application.confirm_delete_pl: Are you sure you want to permanently delete these __count__ items?

index.select_verify: Please select an item to verify.
index.select_deny: Please select an item to deny.
index.select_unverify: Please select an item to unverify.
index.confirm_verify: Are you sure you want to verify this item?
index.confirm_verify_plural: Are you sure you want to verify the __count__ selected items?
index.confirm_deny: Are you sure you want to deny this item?
index.confirm_deny_plural: Are you sure you want to deny the __count__ selected items?
index.confirm_unverify: Are you sure you want to unverify this item?
index.confirm_unverify_plural: Are you sure you want to unverify the __count__ selected items?

new.select_group: Please select a group to join.
new.confirm: Are you sure you want to join this group?
new.confirm_plural: Are you sure you want to join these __count__ groups?
